params.taskDescription: List the ordered pairs of the relation.
params.detailedSolution:
The ordered pairs of the relation are: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow>
    <mo>{</mo>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>3</mn>
          <mo>,</mo>
          <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
          <mn>3</mn>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mo>,</mo>
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>2</mn>
          <mo>,</mo>
          <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
          <mn>2</mn>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mo>,</mo>
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>1</mn>
          <mo>,</mo>
          <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
          <mn>0</mn>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mo>,</mo>
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mn>0</mn>
          <mo>,</mo>
          <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>1</mn>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mo>,</mo>
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mn>2</mn>
          <mo>,</mo>
          <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>2</mn>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mo>,</mo>
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mn>4</mn>
          <mo>,</mo>
          <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
          <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
          <mn>4</mn>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
    </mrow>
    <mo>}</mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left\{ {\left( {-3,\,3} \right),\left( {-2,\,2} \right),\left( {-1,\,0} \right),\left( {0,\,-1} \right),\left( {2,\,-2} \right),\left( {4,\,-4} \right)} \right\}</annotation></semantics></math>.

params.taskDescription: Find the domain of the relation.

  <mi>x</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">x</annotation></semantics></math>-values of the relation: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>

</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left\{ {-3,-2,-1,0,2,4} \right\}</annotation></semantics></math>.
